statements: UPDATE dancers SET dancer_name='Alice', next_of_kin_name='Eve', next_of_kin_contact='123-456-7890' WHERE dancer_id=1;
UPDATE dancers SET allergies='None', medical_conditions='Asthma' WHERE dancer_name='Bob';
UPDATE dancers SET next_of_kin_contact='555-789-1234', allergies='Peanuts' WHERE dancer_id=1;
UPDATE dancers SET medical_conditions='Asthma', next_of_kin_name='Jane Doe' WHERE dancer_name='Alice';
UPDATE DancerContacts SET next_of_kin_name='Emily Johnson', next_of_kin_contact='555-1234' WHERE dancer_id=1;
UPDATE DanceGroup SET group_leader_name='John Davis', group_leader_contact='555-5678' WHERE group_id=3;
UPDATE DancerContacts SET next_of_kin_name='John Doe', next_of_kin_contact='+123456789', medical_conditions='None' WHERE dancer_id=1
UPDATE DanceGroup SET group_leader_name='Jane Smith', group_leader_contact='+987654321' WHERE group_id=2
UPDATE DancerEmergencyContacts SET medical_conditions = 'None' WHERE dancer_id = 1;
UPDATE NextOfKinContacts SET phone = '123-456-7890', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE next_of_kin_id = 1;
UPDATE DancerEmergencyContacts SET next_of_kin_name='Emily Smith', next_of_kin_phone='+1-123-456-7890' WHERE dancer_id=101;
UPDATE NextOfKinContacts SET email='emily@example.com', phone='+1-987-654-3210' WHERE next_of_kin_id=201;
UPDATE Dancer SET full_name = 'John Doe', phone_number = '1234567890' WHERE dancer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE NextOfKin SET relationship = 'Parent', phone_number = '9876543210' WHERE dancer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Dancer SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='9876543210' WHERE dancer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE MedicalCondition SET description='Updated description', condition_name='Asthma' WHERE dancer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE DancerInfo SET DancerName='Alice', DancerEmail='alice@example.com' WHERE DancerID=1;

UPDATE DancerInfo SET DancerEmail = 'john.doe@example.com', EmergencyContactName = 'Jane Doe' WHERE DancerID = 1;
UPDATE MedicalConditions SET ConditionDescription = 'None' WHERE DancerID = 1;
